Notes: Hugo Award winner , Locus Award SF nominee , 1986 ; Nebula Award winner , 1985

Title: Speaker for the Dead
Notes: Hugo , and Locus SF Award winner , Campbell Award nominee , 1987 ; Nebula Award winner , 1986

Title: Ender 's War
Notes: Omnibus of Ender 's Game and Speaker for the Dead

Title: Gloriously Bright
Notes: Gloriously Bright was published in the January 1991 issue of Analog Science Fiction and Fact . Gloriously Bright is reprinted as parts of Chapters 1 , 3 , 5 , 7 , 9 , and 11 of Xenocide . It also includes about 20 paragraphs recounting Jane 's story from Speaker for the Dead that are not republished anywhere else

Title: Xenocide
Notes: Hugo and Locus SF Awards nominee , 1992

Title: Ender 's Shadow
Notes: Parallel novel to Ender 's Game . Locus SF Award nominee , 2000

Title: A Young Man with Prospects
Notes: Published online . Incorporated into Ender in Exile as chapter 5

Title: Ender 's Stocking
Notes: Published online . The beginning of this story , but not the whole story , is included as chapter 2 in A War of Gifts : An Ender Story

Title: A War of Gifts : An Ender Story
Ender 's Homecoming
Notes: Published online . Included in Ender in Exile
